definitions.text: an outbuilding with a single story; used for shelter or storage

examples: he shed his image as a pushy boss

definitions.text: pour out in drops or small quantities or as if in drops or small quantities
examples: God shed His grace on Thee

definitions.text: cause or allow (a solid substance) to flow or run out or over
examples: spill the beans all over the table

definitions.text: cast off hair, skin, horn, or feathers
shed at an early stage of development
examples: the caducous calyx of a poppy
